general.steam_controller_notice: External controller isn't detected? Try the steamdeck-input-disabler plugin from Decky.

generic.title: VacuumTube Settings
generic.description: Opens the VacuumTube settings overlay. You can access this overlay anywhere using Ctrl/Cmd+O or R3 on controllers.

ad_block.title: Ad Block
ad_block.description: Seamlessly blocks video and feed ads, not subject to YouTube's methods of preventing blockers

sponsorblock.title: SponsorBlock
sponsorblock.description: Skips sponsor segments in YouTube videos using a crowdsourced database. Currently only supports skipping sponsors

dearrow.title: DeArrow
dearrow.description: Replaces titles and thumbnails with more accurate, less sensationalized versions from a public crowdsourced database. Slows down loading, as it has to fetch info from the server

dislikes.title: Return Dislikes
dislikes.description: Uses community data from the Return YouTube Dislike API (returnyoutubedislike.com) to show rough dislike counts. Slows down video loading, as it has to fetch info from the server

remove_super_resolution.title: Remove Super Resolution
remove_super_resolution.description: Remove "Super resolution" (AI upscaled) qualities from low quality videos

hide_shorts.title: Hide Shorts
hide_shorts.description: Hides YouTube Shorts from the homepage

h264ify.title: Force H.264 (h264ify)
h264ify.description: Forces YouTube to only stream videos in the H.264 codec. This can help with performance and battery life on slower devices, but prevents you from watching anything above 1080p. Relaunch after toggling.

hardware_decoding.title: Hardware Decoding
hardware_decoding.description: Uses your GPU to decode videos when possible. Disabling this may fix playback issues, but can cause lag depending on your CPU. Relaunch after toggling.

low_memory_mode.title: Low Memory Mode
low_memory_mode.description: Tells YouTube to enable low memory mode, which may improve performance on slower devices at the cost of some visual effects. Relaunch after toggling.

fullscreen.title: Fullscreen
fullscreen.description: Enables fullscreen, and makes VacuumTube always launch in fullscreen

keep_on_top.title: Keep on Top
keep_on_top.description: Enables Keep on Top, and makes VacuumTube launch with the window pinned on top of every other window

userstyles.title: Custom CSS (Userstyles)
userstyles.description: Place .css files in the userstyles folder to customize the interface. Changes are applied automatically.

controller_support.title: Controller Support
controller_support.description: Enables support for game controllers, including navigation and video playback controls. Requires an external controller, such as an Xbox Controller.
